definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: If you believe Sony it's still the best camera even without OIS.
sentences.chinese: 如果你相信索尼尽管没有光学防抖仍然是最好的相机。

sentences.english: By 1958, new models of transistor radios from Sony sold widely throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 到1958年，索尼新型晶体管收音机销遍全世界。

sentences.english: In ten years Sony sold 50 million units of the device.
sentences.chinese: 索尼公司在10年之内销售了五千万台沃克曼。

sentences.english: Natasha looked with her big, wide eyes at Sonya as though not understanding her question.
sentences.chinese: 娜塔莎瞪大眼睛望着索尼娅，仿佛不明白她在问什么。

sentences.english: Take a jump to see the key features and specifications of latest Sony Cybershot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 采取跳看到的主要功能和规格索尼最新的数码相机。

sentences.english: Excuse me, Sonia , is this your pencil?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，索尼亚。这是你的铅笔吗？

sentences.english: Sony’s additional screen layers make the E Ink less sharp.
sentences.chinese: 索尼附加的屏幕层让电子墨水的显示效果不够锐利。
索尼埃几时和你联络的？

sentences.english: The second step is to consolidate Sony’s current products and platforms.
sentences.chinese: 合并索尼当前的产品和平台。

sentences.english: I remember buying a Sony MP3 in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 我记得我在九零年代买过一个索尼的MP3播放器。

sentences.english: Sony stops selling tape Walkman in Japan after 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 索尼宣布在日本停售磁带随身听。

sentences.english: The problem for Sony now is that the sheer weight of USPs is against them.
sentences.chinese: 但是现在困扰索尼的问题是卖点完全不在他们一边。

sentences.english: By punishing them, Sony became a target of their considerable wrath.
sentences.chinese: 惩罚了他们，索尼公司成为发泄他们愤怒的靶子。

sentences.english: Nintendo and Sony. This is a call out to you.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂和索尼，这是对你们的一个召唤。

sentences.english: So, also you looked at the early days of Sony when they had that rice cooker.
sentences.chinese: 还有索尼的早期，那时他们还做电饭煲。

sentences.english: "Sonya" claims to have managed two such routes.
sentences.chinese: “索尼娅”声称搞定过两条这样的路线。

definition: three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Olympus, Japanese manufacturer of cameras and optical instruments
